name: aperture
title: Aperture
description: Record you screen directly from Raycast
author: jomifepe

commands.name: record.command
commands.title: Start/Stop Recording Your Screen
commands.subtitle: Aperture
commands.description: Start or stop recording your screen using Aperture

preferences.name: postSaveAction
preferences.title: Post Save Actions
preferences.description: What to do after stopping and saving the recording file

preferences.name: copyToClipboard
preferences.label: Copy To Clipboard
preferences.description: Whether to copy the file to the clipboard after saving

scripts.build:aperture-cli: rm -rf .build/aperture-node && git clone https://github.com/wulkano/aperture-node.git .build/aperture-node && cd .build/aperture-node && npm run build && mv aperture ../../assets/aperture-cli && cd ../../ && rm -rf .build/aperture-node
scripts.build:aperture-indicator: cd Sources/aperture-indicator && xcodebuild build -scheme aperture-indicator -configuration Release -sdk macosx SYMROOT=${PWD}/Build && rm -rf ../../assets/aperture-indicator.app && mv Build/Release/aperture-indicator.app ../../assets/aperture-indicator.app
